review: This stick is perfect for streaming Netflix and Amazon Prime Videos. We don't really use it for much else because Netflix and Amazon have so much content. But there are hundreds upon hundreds of on demand video channels, including channels that offer free movies, but those movies are either low budget or just not very good. The device does have glitches every now and then, like running slow or freezing which either requires a restart of the device via the settings menu, or restarting it by unplugging it. But overall it's still worth the low price, especially if Netflix and Amazon Prime Videos are your main thing.
